description.lang: FEATURES:- Manual or Z-Wave on/off and brightness control- Simple Direct 3-Way: connect with existing on/off switches in 3-way, 4-way, and 5-way set-ups, no add-on needed (neutral wire required)- Fully adjustable ramp rate for just the right on/off speed- Double tap to full brightness feature- Remembers and restores on/off status after power failure- LED indicator signals inclusion, exclusion, reset, and setting changes- Built-in Z-Wave Plus signal repeater to extend network range- Extended compatibility with LED bulbs, no more flickering!- S2 security protocol and the latest 500 Z-Wave chip for faster and safer wireless communication- Customizable LED indicator and air-gap switch for added safetySPECIFICATIONS:- Model Number: ZEN27- Z-Wave Signal Frequency: 908.42 MHz- Power: 120 VAC, 60 Hz- Maximum Load: 100 W LED/CFL, 300 W incandescent (100 W withboth sides of heat sink tabs off)- Range: Up to 100 feet line of sight- Operating Temperature: 32-104 F (0-40 C)- Installation and Use: Indoor only
Z-Wave Plus Lifeline
This device will sendMULTILEVEL REPORT to Group 1 and 2 when operated manually.
Choose if you want the upper paddle to turn the light on or turn the light off when tapped.
Upper paddle turns the light on, lower paddle turns the light off
Upper paddle turns the light off, lower paddle turns the light on
Set the minimum brightness level (in %) for your dimmer. You wont be able to dim the light below the set value.
% brightness

Set the maximum brightness level (in %) for your dimmer. You wont be able to add brightness to the light beyond the set value. Note: if Parameter 12 is set to value 0, Parameter 11 is automatically disabled.
% brightness
Choose if you want the dimmer to turn on to full brightness or custom brightness level after you double-tap the upper paddle.
the light will turn on to full brightness with double tap (default)
the light will turn on to the maximum brightness level set in Parameter 11 with double tap
Choose if you want the LED indicator to turn on when the switch (light) is on or off, or if you want it to remain on or off at all times.
LED indicator is on when switch is off, LED indicator is off when switch is on
LED indicator is on when switch is on, LED indicator is off when switch is off
LED indicator is always OFF
LED indicator is always ON
Use this parameter to enable or disable the auto turn-off timer function.
timer disabled
timer enabled
Use this parameter to set the time after which you want the switch to automatically turn off once it has been turned on. The number entered as value corresponds to the number of minutes.
minutes
Use this parameter to enable or disable the auto turn-on timer function.
timer disabled
timer enabled
Use this parameter to set the time after which you want the switch to automatically turn on once it has been turned off. The number entered as value corresponds to the number of minutes.
minutes

name.lang: On Off Status After Power Failure

description.lang: Set the on off status for the switch after power failure.
forced to OFF (regardless of state prior to power outage)
forced to ON (regardless of state prior to power outage)
remembers and restores on/off status after power failure

Adjust the ramp rate foryour dimmer (fade-in / fade-out effect for on / off operation).Values correspond to the number of seconds it take for the dimmer to reach full brightness or turn off when operated manually.
seconds
